item.title: Report X-2024072463
item.description:
Report X-2024072463

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-15T15:13:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-23
  • City: LINCOLN
  • State: NE
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: BNSF RAILWAY COMPANY
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 64500
  • Serious Incident Ind: Yes
  • Description: GATX 221593 was involved in a derailment in the Lincoln, NE Hobson yard on 7/23/2024. GATX 221593 bottom outlet secondary cap was sheered off and the ball valve was opened during the derailment. Approximately 500 gallons was released from GATX 221593.
